titleStmt.title: A Brief discourse of changing ministers tithes into stipends, or into another thing ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. for W. Lee ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

(from t.p.) I. How tithes are of divine right, how not -- II. How canonicall, ecclesiasticall, politicall or judiciall -- III. How leviticall, how not -- IV. Not ceremoniall -- V. How alterable, and how not.
